pageTitle: Torn by Ronny Kobo Madeleine Knit Top | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 24in / 61cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. 55% silk/40% cotton/5% cashmere. Fabric: Knit. Geometric patterns detail the crisp, contrast stripes on this cozy, vintage-inspired sweater. Banding adds volume to the long raglan sleeves, and a tasseled tie fastens the keyhole. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Born in Israel and raised in Hong Kong, designer Ronny Kobo has also lived in New York and London and finds inspiration in her globe-trotting lifestyle. Embracing spontaneity, Kobo has created a line of comfortable, versatile, and sexy clothing that easily travels from sofa to safari to Riviera. Crafted with the carefree adventurer in mind, Torn by Ronny Kobo is a staple for any woman who packs light and travels often.
